Package org.waarp.common.service

Interface for Apache Daemon tool to run as a Service (Windows or Unix) one program

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EngineAbstract
    Abstract class to implement to be able to start or shutdown a service
    ServiceLauncher
    Launch the Engine from a variety of sources, either through a main() or invoked through Apache Daemon.

Package org.waarp.common.service Description

Interface for Apache Daemon tool to run as a Service (Windows or Unix) one program
